description:
YARG is an Open-Source plastic band rhythm game! 
Play through the YARG Official Setlist for the crowd,
and maybe get some free items from your fans!

0.0.10.description:
# Client Update 0.0.5 Required!

Changes:

- Item and location names now have a new format: `[song] by [artist]`

Fixes:

- Both songs called "Burn" are now able to be generated!
- Fixed a unit test failure from having item names that were only numbers.

## What's Changed
* 16 unduplicate song dictionary keys by @energymaster22 in https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/pull/19


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/compare/0.0.9...0.0.10

0.0.4.description:
# Client update 0.0.2 required!

New Options:
- Deathlink
- Goal Song Visibility
- Adjustable Song Count
- Adjustable YARG Gem Requirement For Goal Song

Changes:
- Goal song now requires you to collect YARG Gems from the world
- "Star Power Bonus" now grants 25% star power instead of the YARG Gems

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/compare/0.0.3...0.0.4

0.0.5.description:
# Client update 0.0.3 required!

New Options:

- Energy Link
- Enabled Setlists

Changes:

- You can now pick from all of the YARC setlists using the "Enabled Setlists" option. (I recommend using the options creator for easier time adding setlists as it has a search.)
- Song list now has more metadata for client compatability

Known Issues:

- World sometimes fails generation with minimal accessibility set along side a high YARG Gem count

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/compare/0.0.4...0.0.5

0.0.6.description:
# Use Client Version 0.0.3. No Client Update Required!

New:
- Added the 5 new songs from YARG Official Setlist Wave 14!

## What's Changed
* Added wave 14 songs by @energymaster22 in https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/pull/5

## New Contributors
* @energymaster22 made their first contribution in https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/pull/5

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/compare/0.0.5...0.0.6

0.0.7.description:
# Client Update 0.0.4 Required!

New:
- Instrument Shuffle!
  - Ties each song to a selected instrument and locks that instrument away in the multiworld!
  - Make sure to read the option info for more details.

Changes:
- Songs now give 3 items to help lower gen failures due to restrictive start, especially in instrument shuffle

## What's Changed
* Pull new songs into instrument shuffle branch by @energymaster22 in https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/pull/6
* Swapped missed apquest class names to yarg class names by @energymaster22 in https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/pull/9
* pull region fix from main by @energymaster22 in https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/pull/10
* Implement Instrument Shuffle by @energymaster22 in https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/pull/11
* Update README by @energymaster22 in https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/pull/12
* removed debug print statements by @energymaster22 in https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/pull/13


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/compare/0.0.6...0.0.7

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/energymaster22/YARGArchipelago/compare/0.0.7...0.0.8
